about.us: Endorsed by GreenPeace (US & UK), Friends of the Earth, & The Dian Fossey Gorilla Fund, Sleeping Natives is an environmental non-profit organization dedicated to inspire, inform, and accelerate the adoption of decentralized, alternative energy & financial technologies. Presently, we have 4 projects in total, of which SVRN, our Cardano Stake Pool Operation, is one of them. Please visit our sites to learn more!
about.hardware: 1 primary block producing node w/ online backup BP, plus 3 relays in as many continents (North + South America, & Europe).
